code: import React,{useContext,useState}from'react';import'./Fooditem.css';import{assets}from'../assets/assets';import AOS from'aos';import'aos/dist/aos.css';import{useEffect}from'react';import{StoreContext}from'../Menu/CONTEXT/StoreContext';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Fooditem=_ref=>{let{id,name,price,description,image}=_ref;const{cartitem,addtocart,remove,url}=useContext(StoreContext);useEffect(()=>{AOS.init({duration:1000});},[]);console.log("llooo",cartitem);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{"data-aos":"fade-up",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{"data-aos":"zoom-in",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"food-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"food-item-img-container",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"food-iem-img",src:url+"/Images/"+image}),!cartitem[id]?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img1",src:assets.add_icon_white,onClick:()=>addtocart(id)}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"food",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img2",onClick:()=>remove(id),src:assets.remove_icon_red}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:cartitem[id]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"img3",onClick:()=>addtocart(id),src:assets.add_icon_green})]})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"food-item-info",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"fod-item-info1",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"name",children:name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{className:"star",src:assets.rating_starts})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"des",children:description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{className:"pri",children:[" PRICE:",price,"/-"]})]})]})})});};export default Fooditem;
